alert.note: Alert for Essex; Richmond; Westmoreland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 6:31PM EDT until June 16 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Richmond County in east central Virginia... Southwestern Westmoreland County in east central Virginia... Northwestern Essex County in east central Virginia... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 631 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Loretto, or near Champlain, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Loretto around 635 PM EDT. Leedstown around 640 PM EDT. Champlain around 655 PM EDT. Newland around 710 PM EDT. Tappahannock around 715 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Ethel, Hustle, Naylors Beach, Mount Landing, Supply, Piney Grove, Rexburg, Caret, Dunbrooke and Chance. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
